images.caption: The Riverlands and the location of Oldstones
Catelyn and Robb contemplate King Tristifer IV\'s tomb.Art by onionjulius

name: Oldstones
summary: Oldstones is the name given to the remnants of an ancient castle in the Riverlands that once belonged to House Mudd. Its original name has long been lost. The local smallfolk gave it its new name of "Oldstones". [1]
